translation.en: How about a story?
Let's see. Where to begin?
Last year, our dairy farm
officially opened the Bernet Farm Wine Vineyards.
translation.it: L'anno scorso, abbiamo inaugurato i Vigneti della Tenuta Bernet.

translation.en: Even though we don't have to step on grapes to make wine nowadays,
translation.it: Anche se oggi non c'è più bisogno di calpestare l'uva per fare il vino,

translation.en: I convinced my sister that grapes squishing between your toes makes people happy.
translation.it: ho convinto mia sorella che sentirla tra le dita ti rende felice.

translation.en: It was my mom's favorite.
I spent most weekends learning everything there is about dairy farming
translation.it: Ho passato quasi tutti i weekend a studiare il caseificio,

translation.en: so I can help out even more around here.
translation.it: così posso dare una mano ancora di più.

translation.en: I had the best teachers.
Well, teacher.
My sister Callie still runs the place, of course.
translation.it: Mia sorella Callie gestisce ancora tutto.

translation.en: And with the extra money from the wine,
translation.it: Con i guadagni aggiuntivi del vino,

translation.en: we were finally able to hire some extra farmhands.
translation.it: siamo riusciti ad assumere altri braccianti.

translation.en: And yet, Callie never stops getting her hands dirty,
translation.it: Eppure, Callie non smette mai di sporcarsi le mani.

translation.en: but I've never seen her so happy.
translation.it: Ma non l'ho mai vista così felice.

translation.en: Okay.
Come this way. No dust got in any eyes. Right?
translation.it: Di qua. Non vi è finita polvere negli occhi, vero?

translation.en: Manny here is not only our property manager
translation.it: Manny non è solo il nostro manager,

translation.en: but our esteemed vintner and sommelier.
translation.it: ma anche uno stimato vignaiolo e sommelier.

translation.en: -Now, Manny. -Yes.
Have you tried this bottle yet?
I have never met you. And I have never tried this bottle before.
translation.it: Non ti conosco e non ho mai provato questa bottiglia.

translation.en: Okay.
Feast your eyes. [sniffs]
-Birch sap. -[Callie] Mm.
Honeysuckle.
[smacks lips] Chocolat.
[smacks lips, sighs] And ground coriander! It's a gift.

translation.en: -[Manny] No. I've been practicing a lot. -[Callie chuckles]

translation.en: -I know she's here with us every day. -[cows mooing]

Yeah.
Let's go.
-Hey. Are you okay? -[panting] Yeah. I'm fine.
-Let's practice. -What?
[man] I'm gonna get it!

to the innovation of historical…
[chuckles] Of, uh…
uh… uh, very, uh, historical innovations and--

Nailed it. [chuckles]

translation.en: No! You guys need to stay safe. Okay? Can't be drinking that much.

How's everybody doing today? Good?

translation.en: Oh. Okay. [scoffs]
You taking a… a wine break, babe?

H… he loves the wine.
It was exactly one year ago that I stumbled onto this property

translation.en: and became a ranch hand.
And I didn't know it at the time…
…but it was the best thing that ever happened to me.

translation.en: Callie, I know what life is like without you.

-…will you marry me? -[gasps, laughs]
[gasps] Yes, yes, yes!
All right! Yes!
Get a room.

Thank you.
Yeah. I, uh… I gotta go too. I… I got a date.

translation.en: With me.
Somebody may have downloaded Deep Down Under on the Ocu-VR,

translation.en: where it breaks, you swim, you live, you die.

I'd much rather be here with you.

Both of you.

Callie, can I… can I borrow you for a second?

Your love.

I'll go.

translation.en: Last year we had the, uh… the third-biggest Christmas tree
translation.it: L'anno scorso avevamo il terzo albero di Natale più grande

translation.en: in San Francisco.
-I said, "Last year." -[both laugh]
We got lucky. It didn't fit in one of the Van Aston hotel lobbies.
translation.it: Era troppo grande per una hall del Van Aston.

translation.en: -Joseph hooked us up. -[woman] Owen. Hello.
translation.it: - Ce l'ha dato Joseph. - Owen, ci sei?

translation.en: -Stick around for the show? [laughs] -Why not? [laughs]
translation.it: - Ti fermi per lo spettacolo? - Perché no?

translation.en: Just cheer at the end. Otherwise I'm stand--
I have to change. I'll be… just one sec… [chuckles]
So let us keep the spirit of Christmas in our hearts
translation.it: Custodiamo lo spirito del Natale nel cuore

translation.en: for all the days of our lives.
[Owen] Thank you. Thank you, all.
-Really appreciate it. -Yeah.
-Thank you for the donation. Thank you. -Yeah. See you next time.
translation.it: - Grazie per la donazione. - Nulla, alla prossima.

translation.en: -Who knew you were quite the actor. -[both laugh]
translation.it: Chi l'avrebbe detto, sei un bravo attore!

translation.en: Not that good. [laughs]
It was so good to see you again. -So good to see you. -[cell phone chimes]
translation.it: - È stato bello rivederti. - Anche per me.

translation.en: Oh. This is Joseph. I should go.
Of course. Good to see you. Bring Joseph next time.
translation.it: Porta anche lui la prossima volta.

translation.en: -Bye. -Bye.
Hey.
Hey.
Hey.
I'm… I'm so sorry for calling you in here, but I…
translation.it: Mi dispiace di averti fatta venire fin qui,

translation.en: I kinda need your advice on--
translation.it: ma mi serve il tuo consiglio su…

translation.en: -Why do you smell like-- -The barn? [chuckles]
I was over at Owen's soup kitchen.
translation.it: Ero alla mensa dei poveri di Owen.

translation.en: I was walking, and there was this donkey and…
Anyway, it's a long story, but it's a really sweet thing he has going on over there.
translation.it: Comunque, è una lunga storia, ma è un progetto molto carino.

translation.en: Wait. So, you're saying you had the entire day in a city,
translation.it: Avevi a disposizione una giornata intera in città

translation.en: and you still managed to find a cow pen?
translation.it: e sei riuscita a trovare una mucca?

translation.en: Donkey pen.
Refills. [sniffs]
My God, that smell.
I'm sorry. I was, uh, over at the soup kitchen.
translation.it: Scusami, vengo dalla mensa dei poveri.

translation.en: You poor thing.
We serve lunch here at 2:00 p.m. each day.
translation.it: Qui puoi pranzare ogni giorno alle 14.

translation.en: Great.
Next time, then.
Callie and I have been running two successful businesses the past year.
translation.it: Callie e io gestiamo due attività di successo,

translation.en: Between the dairy farm and the winery, I… I thought she'd have some good ideas.
translation.it: un caseificio e un'azienda vinicola. Ci darà buoni consigli.

translation.en: I told you, after the gala, the suppliers--
translation.it: Tanto dopo il gala, i fornitori…

translation.en: Look, it's not that simple, Victoria.
My mother was the face of the company. She dealt with everyone.
translation.it: Mia madre era il volto dell'azienda.

translation.en: Without those personal connections, our relationships are dropping like flies.
translation.it: Senza le sue conoscenze, i rapporti si stanno logorando.

translation.en: Okay, well, th… then we fix that.
I think we need to take advantage of the Christmas spirit
and get personal with the suppliers.
Bring a little small town to the big city.
translation.it: Legami da paese in una grande città.

translation.en: The main reason my family got by all of those years
translation.it: La mia famiglia non è andata avanti per anni

translation.en: wasn't because people were obsessed with our baked goods or cheeses.
translation.it: solo grazie ai prodotti da forno e ai formaggi.

translation.en: It was because our customers were like family, and they believed in us.
translation.it: I clienti erano la nostra famiglia e credevano in noi.

translation.en: [smacks lips] I say we give every business partner
a verbal Van Aston Enterprises Christmas card, if you will.
translation.it: una telefonata di auguri della Van Aston Enterprises.

translation.en: We'll call every one of them,
thank them for their partnership over the years,
tell them we can't wait to see them at the annual gala,
translation.it: Diremo che li aspettiamo al gala

translation.en: and wish them a Merry Christmas.
translation.it: e che auguriamo loro un buon Natale.

translation.en: I love it.
I'm not getting on the phone with every Tom, Dick, and Harry that we do business with.
translation.it: Non telefonerò a tutti quelli con cui facciamo affari.

translation.en: Oh, fine.
We'll take it from here.
I love you.
I know.
Your grandmother does the same thing? [chuckles]
translation.it: Sua nonna fa la stessa cosa?

translation.en: I love it.
I'll have that confirmation sent over shortly.
translation.it: Le mando la conferma a breve.

translation.en: Look, I understand the disappointment, Tim,
but believe me, by… by staying with us, you will…
translation.it: ma mi creda, se resterete con noi…

translation.en: Um, you're gonna… By staying with us, you will…
Here's the deal.
translation.it: Se sistemiamo i contratti prima delle feste,

translation.en: Locking in the contract before the holidays will clear your head
translation.it: Se sistemiamo i contratti prima delle feste, potrà stare tranquillo con i tuoi figli.

translation.en: so you can spend time with your kids.
translation.it: potrà stare tranquillo con i tuoi figli.

translation.en: [Brandy] Oh. How are the stitches feeling?
She didn't pick up.
Yeah. Look, come on.
You've had a long day. How about some hot chocolate?
translation.it: Oggi hai avuto una giornataccia. Ti va una cioccolata calda?

translation.en: Yeah?
Look, she's gonna call back,
and then you can tell her all about your four-wheeler accident.
translation.it: Così potrai raccontarle del tuo incidente su quattro ruote.

translation.en: How many marshmallows do you want?
-Is that even a question? -[laughs]
That's all of them.
You know, they're really looking forward to this holiday gala.
translation.it: Sì, non vedono l'ora del gala.

translation.en: Ugh. Don't remind me. Why not?
'Cause it's… it's the one time a year we have to ask for money. [sighs]
translation.it: È l'unica volta all'anno in cui dobbiamo chiedere soldi.

translation.en: All while showing how much of it you already have.
They've got all wrong, don't they?
-They do. -[exhales]
Oh my God. I missed three calls from Hannah.
Don't call her now. She's probably sleeping.
Hold on.
We've earned this. [exhales]
It's this new wine I found from the Ber…
translation.it: È un nuovo vino che ho scoperto, della Ber…

translation.en: Bern… Bernat? Bernet? I… I'm not sure how to say it.
translation.it: Bernat? Bernet? Non so come si pronuncia.

translation.en: It's… it's Ber… Bern… I've heard it's good.
translation.it: Forse Bern… Dicono che è buono.

translation.en: -[smacks lips] Blueberries. -Mm-hmm
And chamomile?
Yes! [laughs]
Oh, I'm sorry. [laughs] -That was really, really good. -[whispers] It's okay.
translation.it: Scusami, è che sei stata bravissima.

translation.en: You okay?
Oh, yeah. It's… it's not you.
It's, um… I'm just a little distracted.
Callie's been unreachable the last few days, and, um,
translation.it: Negli ultimi giorni Callie è irraggiungibile.

translation.en: I just hope she's okay.
Hey.
-She's just stressed. -Mmm.
Everyone turns into a bridezilla
translation.it: Le spose impazziscono tutte di tanto in tanto,

translation.en: from time to time before their wedding day.
translation.it: Le spose impazziscono tutte di tanto in tanto, prima del matrimonio.

translation.en: This is Callie we're talking about. [chuckles]
Exactly.
This is Callie we're talking about.
She's a big girl.
Yeah, right.
[Callie laughs] Okay. Where are you taking me?
I thought we were going for a midnight snack.
translation.it: Pensavo volessimo fare uno spuntino di mezzanotte.

translation.en: -All right. Watch your step. -[gasps]
[whispers] Right.
I got you.
Callie, I want you to meet Susan.
Susan, this is Callie.
Who's Susan?
I named her after my grandmother.
What's with the grand gesture?
It's just my way of saying thank you.
translation.it: È solo il mio modo di ringraziarti.

translation.en: I mean, you single-handedly helped retain 80% of our suppliers.
translation.it: Grazie a te abbiamo mantenuto l'80% dei fornitori.

translation.en: And you look good doing it.
translation.it: E poi, sei stupenda anche al lavoro.

translation.en: -Well, you're welcome. -[Joseph chuckles]
And thank you.
Thanks to Victoria, I'll be returning home with an entirely new wardrobe.
translation.it: Grazie a Victoria, praticamente mi sono rifatta il guardaroba.

translation.en: And, uh, speaking of Victoria…
[inhales] …it's just strange you haven't mentioned her before.
translation.it: strano che tu non me ne abbia parlato.

translation.en: Really? That's weird.
Cheers. [exhales]
Cheers.
Now, we can focus on everything else we have to fix.
translation.it: Ora possiamo concentrarci su tutto il resto.

translation.en: I thought we fixed everything with all those phone calls.
Oh my gosh, no. I mean, yeah, it was… it was huge, but we still have so much more to do.
translation.it: Oddio, no. Sì, è stato fantastico, ma c'è ancora molto da fare.

translation.en: Well, I'm here to help.
What do you think of the city so far?
I never thought I'd say this, but I love it.
translation.it: Non avrei mai pensato di dirlo, ma la adoro.

translation.en: Meetings with two-legged mammals instead of four
translation.it: Incontro mammiferi a due zampe e non quattro.

translation.en: and a new latte from a different café every day of the week.
translation.it: E assaggio nuovi caffellatte ogni giorno della settimana.

translation.en: I don't know.
Maybe it wouldn't be such a bad idea to spend some more time here.
translation.it: Forse passare più tempo qui non è una cattiva idea.

translation.en: -It's funny you say that because-- -Speaking of the time, we've been so busy.
translation.it: - È buffo, perché… - A proposito, siamo stati così impegnati.

translation.en: No. I haven't signed it yet. You sent it to me yesterday.
translation.it: No, non l'ho ancora firmato. Me l'hai mandato ieri.

translation.en: It's a big decision. I can't make my mind up overnight.
translation.it: Non posso decidere così, su due piedi.

translation.en: Well, I printed out a copy for you just in case.
translation.it: Beh, te ne ho stampata una copia. Non si sa mai.

translation.en: -You haven't told her yet? -No.
-What about last night? -Shh.
Best one yet.
Okay. So, we have the venue.
We have the suit. We have the dress.
[Callie] Ugh. Should I have bought that dress?
I don't know. I always thought I'd wear my mom's dress on my wedding day.
translation.it: Ho sempre pensato di indossare l'abito di mia madre.

translation.en: You'd be doing the world a disservice if you didn't wear that gorgeous dress.
translation.it: Faresti un torto al mondo se non indossassi quel vestito.

translation.en: Your mother will understand. Sometimes, you just have to call an audible.
translation.it: Tua madre capirà. A volte, bisogna cambiare tattica.

translation.en: Call an audible?
I watch sports. Go Niners.
[Victoria] Hello, lovebirds.
Leo. [inhales]
I want to personally thank you for the work you put in this week.
translation.it: Volevo ringraziarti personalmente per il lavoro.

translation.en: You're like our perfect little Christmas gift, aren't you?
translation.it: Sei il regalo di Natale perfetto per tutti noi.

translation.en: -Hmm. -Thank you. I'm just happy I could help.
I told your fiancé to consider offering you an official position once you're all settled in.
translation.it: Ho detto a Joseph di offrirti un incarico, quando sarete sistemati.

translation.en: S… settled in?
I've got four gorgeous condominiums to show you, each over 3,000 square feet,
translation.it: Ho quattro splendidi appartamenti da mostrarvi, 280 metri quadri,

translation.en: killer views, perfect for potentially adding to the family within a year or two.
translation.it: vista da favola, perfetti per allargare la famiglia in futuro.

translation.en: You just let me know when you two cuties are ready to take a look at them.
translation.it: Quando siete pronti a dare un'occhiata, fatemi sapere.

translation.en: Condominiums?
That might be my fault.
I, um, sprang the news on them just yesterday--
translation.it: Ho dato loro la notizia soltanto ieri…

translation.en: Okay, what news?
My mother
translation.it: Mia madre si dimetterà in via definitiva

translation.en: is stepping down from her position at Van Aston Enterprises permanently.
translation.it: Mia madre si dimetterà in via definitiva dalla Van Aston Enterprises.

translation.en: The company will officially turn over to my name if I sign the paperwork.
translation.it: Se firmo i documenti, l'azienda passerà a me.

translation.en: I thought you were past hiding things from me. The decision hasn't been made yet.
translation.it: - Non dovevamo nasconderci nulla. - Non ho deciso.

translation.en: -I was gonna tell you last night-- -So tell me now, then.
What happens to our life in Petaluma?
translation.it: E la nostra vita a Petaluma?

translation.en: Oh, I love the life that we've created.
translation.it: Adoro la vita che ci siamo creati.

translation.en: But you, more than anyone, should know this is my dad's company.
translation.it: Ma dovresti capirmi, è l'azienda di mio padre.

translation.en: Either I sign the paperwork, or we lose everything that he worked for.
translation.it: O firmo, o perdiamo tutto quello per cui ha lavorato.

translation.en: [Callie] You can't keep cutting me out like this.
translation.it: Non puoi continuare a tenermi fuori.

translation.en: It's like you're trying to get rid of me.
-God, no. Callie, we can figure this out-- -Figure yourself out.
translation.it: - Dio, no. Possiamo rifletterci insieme. - Riflettici tu.

translation.en: I can't marry two of you.
translation.it: Non posso sposare due te diversi.

translation.en: What's that supposed to mean?
I need some air.
Hey.
What did that ever do to you?
I don't want it. Nothing's the same.
translation.it: Non lo voglio. Ora è tutto diverso.

translation.en: [smacks lips] It's okay that things change, Hannah.
I mean, if they didn't, then you'd still be wearing diapers.
But she didn't even know I got stitches.
And now they're out, and she still doesn't care. It's like she forgot about us.
translation.it: Ora li ho tolti e non le importa. Si è dimenticata di noi.

translation.en: And it's the last Sunday before Christmas.
translation.it: È l'ultima domenica prima di Natale.

translation.en: This is the day we decorate our tree. She probably forgot about that too.
translation.it: Quando addobbiamo l'albero. Si sarà dimenticata anche di quello.

translation.en: Hey, hey.
Your sister's kind of busy planning the wedding of her dreams.
translation.it: Sta organizzando il matrimonio dei suoi sogni.

translation.en: She's getting married Christmas Eve.
translation.it: Si sposerà alla vigilia di Natale.

translation.en: How fun will that be?
So let's cut her some slack. Okay?
[inhales] You know what? When she's back, we can punish her
translation.it: Sai una cosa? Quando torna, la puniremo

translation.en: and give her all the poopy jobs that she usually gives us, huh?
translation.it: assegnandole i compiti peggiori che fa fare a noi.

translation.en: -Okay. -Okay. [chuckles]
Let's decorate a Christmas tree so hard
translation.it: E ora addobbiamo un albero così bello

translation.en: that they can see that sucker all the way from San Francisco, huh?
translation.it: che lo vedranno fino a San Francisco.

translation.en: Okay?
♪ Of holiday reds and greens ♪
translation.it: COS'È SUCCESSO? NON MI FANNO PIÙ MALE!

translation.en: -[donkey brays] -[Owen] Come see our Christmas show!
All tickets are donation-based.
Profits support the homeless in the city.
translation.it: I profitti aiuteranno i senzatetto della città.

translation.en: We serve warm meals all season long.
It's so crowded today.
Most people who come on weekends have jobs.
translation.it: Chi viene nei weekend spesso ha un lavoro.

translation.en: Unless you make a fortune, the city will swallow you up.
translation.it: Se non sei ricco, la città ti inghiottisce.

translation.en: Especially if you got a family to feed.
So hard to believe.
I mean, it seems like money grows on trees in this city.
translation.it: Sembra che in questa città i soldi crescano sugli alberi.

translation.en: Only for those rich enough to plant them in the first place.
translation.it: Solo per chi ne ha abbastanza da piantarli.

translation.en: Like the Van Astons.
Oh, yeah.
Speaking of, I was surprised Joseph didn't keep up the donations,
translation.it: A proposito, mi ha sorpreso che Joseph abbia ritirato le donazioni.

translation.en: especially after knowing you and I grew up together.
The Van Astons pay for this soup kitchen?
translation.it: I Van Aston sovvenzionano la mensa dei poveri?

translation.en: Yeah. You… you didn't know?
-[sighs] The company is struggling and-- -Oh, don't feel like you need to explain.
translation.it: - L'azienda è in difficoltà e… - Non devi spiegarmi nulla.

translation.en: We're… we are lucky to have had their support for as long as we did.
translation.it: Siamo stati fortunati ad avere il loro sostegno finora.

translation.en: Hey, Ainsley.
You wanna help out for a bit before the show?
translation.it: Dai una mano prima dello spettacolo?

translation.en: [smacks lips] Um, no.
Ainsley, this is Callie, my friend from home.
translation.it: Lei è Callie, la mia amica d'infanzia.

translation.en: Uh, we hired Ainsley to be our Mother Mary this year.
translation.it: Abbiamo ingaggiato Ainsley nel ruolo di Maria.

translation.en: Yeah, about that. I can't make it tonight.
translation.it: Sì, a proposito. Stasera non ce la faccio.

translation.en: I booked a job, so…
We're on in 20 minutes.
Not my problem.
Who can I possibly find to play Mother Mary in the next 20 minutes?
translation.it: Dove posso trovare una nuova Maria nel giro di 20 minuti?

translation.en: I forgot my phone.
Good luck.
You sure this is okay?
'Cause we have two performances. You'll be here all day…
-I got… I gotta change. -[both chuckle]
What's with the outfit?
I thought you needed an excuse.
Here you go.
Probably more than you'll make all month.
translation.it: Più di quanto fai in un mese.

translation.en: You're welcome.
Whatever.
[Owen] All bringing forth what would soon be known
as the most precious gift the world would ever receive.
translation.it: come il dono più prezioso di sempre.

translation.en: The God of the universe came to us in the form of a tiny, lowly baby.
translation.it: Il Dio dell'universo è venuto da noi con le sembianze di un umile neonato.

translation.en: So let us keep the spirit of Christmas in our hearts
translation.it: Custodiamo lo spirito del Natale nei nostri cuori

translation.en: for all the days of our lives.
[Owen] Thank you. Thank you all! That's it for now.
Stick around for the next show, if you'd like.
translation.it: Se vi va, fermatevi per il prossimo spettacolo.

translation.en: -Pet Hopey. She's very, very nice. -[Callie laughs]
[recording] Hey, friends. You've reached Callie Bernet. Please leave a message.
translation.it: Ciao, avete chiamato Callie Bernet. Lasciate un messaggio.

translation.en: [Owen] You killed it today.
You're a natural Virgin.
-Please never say that again. -[both laugh]
Well, I may be selfish, but I'd love to have you in the city.
translation.it: Sarò egoista, ma mi piacerebbe se tu vivessi in città.

translation.en: [smacks lips] I missed you.
It really does feel like yesterday.
You and Liam begging me to drive you to the movies.
translation.it: Tu e Liam che mi implorate di portarvi al cinema in auto.

translation.en: Life was so simple back then.
translation.it: La vita era semplice, a quei tempi.

translation.en: You don't remember, do you?
Remember what?
How you and Liam used to fight like dogs over your futures.
translation.it: Tu e Liam litigavate di continuo per il vostro futuro.

translation.en: He wanted you to follow him to UC Davis.
translation.it: Ti voleva con lui alla UC Davis,

translation.en: You wouldn't have that. You had to go to St. Louis
translation.it: ma tu volevi andare per forza alla Saint Louis

translation.en: to study social economics and agriculture like your dad.
translation.it: per studiare Economia sociale e Agraria come tuo padre.

translation.en: I swear you two had a different plan every week.
And then we never even got the chance to choose one.
translation.it: E non abbiamo avuto la possibilità di sceglierne uno.

translation.en: You would've worked it out 'cause you loved each other.
translation.it: Avreste risolto tutto, perché vi amavate.

translation.en: Yeah.
Relationships are all about compromise.
translation.it: I rapporti si basano sui compromessi.

translation.en: You can't force Joseph to stay away from the city
translation.it: Non puoi tenere Joseph lontano dalla città,

translation.en: any more than he can force you to walk away from the farm.
translation.it: e lui non può farti rinunciare alla fattoria.

translation.en: You and Joseph will work it out.
[Victoria] Where you headed?
Um, j… just back to the hotel. It's a block away. I can walk.
translation.it: Torno all'hotel, è a un isolato. Vado a piedi.

translation.en: Nonsense.
Vanilla chai, right?
Thank you.
Tell me, how are you feeling about everything, dear?
translation.it: Dimmi, cosa ne pensi di tutto questo?

translation.en: I'm just a little tired of it all, to be honest.
translation.it: A dire il vero, sono un po' stanca.

translation.en: Oh, honey.
If you're tired now, wait until you're a few days out from the big day. You won't sleep a wink.
translation.it: Se sei stanca ora, aspetta che la data si avvicini. Non dormirai.

translation.en: I was awake for a full 36 hours before my wedding.
translation.it: Prima del mio matrimonio, non ho dormito 36 ore.

translation.en: How long have you been married?
The wedding never happened. We called it off.
More like he called it off.
translation.it: Più che altro, lui lo ha annullato.

translation.en: I'm sorry to hear that.
I have to say it looks much better on your hand than it did on mine.
translation.it: Ma sta molto meglio sulla tua mano che sulla mia.

translation.en: I always thought my hands were a little too long for an emerald cut.
translation.it: Ho le mani un po' troppo lunghe per un diamante taglio smeraldo.

translation.en: Looks better on thicker hands.
translation.it: Sta meglio sulle mani più grosse.

translation.en: You see how the shape elongates the wrist in a way?
translation.it: Vedi, la forma allunga molto il polso.

translation.en: No offense, of… of course. It's beyond gorgeous.
Oh, he didn't tell you we were engaged?
[inhales] Oh my.
It seems I'm always revealing too much too soon.
-Callie, what are you doing? -Owen's soup kitchen lost all its funding.
translation.it: - Callie, che fai? - La mensa di Owen ha perso i fondi.

translation.en: That's what this is about?
Cal, we had to make cuts to keep the lights on.
I told him we'd try to pick it up after the gala if the suppliers reconfirmed, but--
translation.it: Avremmo ripreso le donazioni se il gala fosse andato bene…

translation.en: The company can afford to put on a gala
that costs more than what most people make in a year,
translation.it: che costa più del salario medio,

translation.en: and you're telling me you can't afford to help people
translation.it: ma non di aiutare le persone

translation.en: who would give anything for a hot meal during the holidays?
translation.it: che darebbero tutto per un pasto caldo?

translation.en: The wedding venue, how much does that cost?
translation.it: Quanto costa la sala per il matrimonio?

translation.en: You know, we could get married at the winery for free.
That's what I pictured for us.
translation.it: Era quello che sognavo per noi.

translation.en: [sighs] You and me, a few special guests, my family's land.
translation.it: Io e te, qualche ospite speciale, la terra della mia famiglia.

translation.en: But you wouldn't know that, would you? Because you never asked me.
translation.it: Ma non puoi saperlo, vero? Non me l'hai mai chiesto.

translation.en: And I don't understand how you can stand there
translation.it: E non capisco come tu possa startene lì

translation.en: and continue to keep secrets from me after everything we've been through.
translation.it: e nascondermi la verità dopo tutto quello che abbiamo passato!

translation.en: If you wanted to give me a secondhand ring,
translation.it: Per darmi un anello di seconda mano,

translation.en: you could have asked me for Liam's.
It's cut better for my fat fingers, according to Victoria.
translation.it: Starebbe meglio sulle mie dita grasse, secondo Victoria.

translation.en: [Joseph] Victoria? What are you talking about--
I'm glad we came here
translation.it: Sono felice che siamo venuti qui.

translation.en: to realize that you belong in this city, Joseph.
translation.it: Ho capito che il tuo posto è in questa città.

translation.en: I don't.

You're my family.

Eight.

Now, in here we are about to assemble millions of dollars,

I consider all of you family. I do.

maybe that's okay.

translation.it: Non ti farò rinunciare alla tua vita.

translation.en: We'll figure something out.
And besides, you've got a lot of work to do.
translation.it: E poi, hai molto lavoro da fare.

translation.en: Multiple charities?
You can't do that all from Petaluma, can you?
translation.it: Non puoi gestire tutto da Petaluma.

translation.en: -And about the wedding-- -Yeah, about that. We lost the venue.
translation.it: - E per il matrimonio… - Sì, a proposito. La Sala è andata.

translation.en: I have another idea.
Uh, Victoria, can I talk to you for a second?
[Joseph] You know I think fondly of our years together.
translation.it: Penso con affetto ai nostri anni insieme.

translation.en: You are hardworking and ambitious.
You're exactly the kind of person that people expected
translation.it: Sei il tipo di persona che tutti si aspettavano

translation.en: Joseph Van Aston to marry.
translation.it: di veder sposare a Joseph Van Aston.

translation.en: I know it's… it's long overdue, but…
translation.it: Avrei dovuto dirtelo molto tempo fa.

translation.en: I'm really sorry,
and I hope you'll forgive me.
What was your excuse again?
"Marriage just isn't for me, V."
[inhales] I always thought I'd be the one who tamed the lion.
translation.it: Ho sempre pensato che avrei domato io il leone.

translation.en: Watching Callie parade around with that rock on her finger was just--
translation.it: Guardare Callie mostrare a tutti quella pietra al dito è stato…

translation.en: Oh, the rock that you said once was on your finger?
translation.it: Quella che una volta indossavi tu?

translation.en: -Joseph-- -[Joseph] I'm not trying to fight.
If I remember right, you kept the ring that I gave you.
translation.it: Se ben ricordo, avevi tenuto il mio anello.

translation.en: Turned it into a beautiful pair of half diamond studs.
translation.it: L'ho trasformato in un bel paio di orecchini.

translation.en: Let's see if they fit!
Why now? After so many years?
translation.it: Perché adesso, dopo tutti questi anni?

translation.en: Well, I guess I'm starting to realize that holding things in,
translation.it: Beh, sto iniziando a capire che, tenendosi tutto dentro,

translation.en: it can really hurt somebody.
translation.it: si può ferire molto gli altri.

translation.en: Yeah? Merry Christmas!
Maybe you have changed, Joseph.
I'm trying to prove it.
To you, to…
to everyone. [exhales]
-Joseph, that photo was-- -[Joseph] I know.
translation.it: - Joseph, quella foto era… - Lo so.

translation.en: It's okay.
All right. Have fun tonight. Okay?
Hey, Joseph hasn't introduced us yet.
translation.it: Ehi, Joseph non ci ha ancora presentati.

translation.en: I'm Owen.
♪ I love you in a forever kind of way ♪
translation.it: CASA È DOVE C'È IL CUORE

translation.en: Joseph! Joseph, um…
-What? -I… I just got… [exhales]
-What? What? -It's time! It's time!
translation.it: Ma che? - Che c'è? - È ora.

translation.en: -For what? -The baby's coming! Hurry!
translation.it: - Di cosa? - Il bambino sta arrivando!

translation.en: -I'll get my truck! -No time for that!
translation.it: - Prendo il furgone! - Non c'è tempo!

translation.en: -I'm gonna be a dad. -Yes, you are gonna be a dad! [laughs]
[Callie] Joseph!
